task.title: Linking Your Flickr Account to Ravelry
task.shortdesc: To add photos from Flickr, you will first need to link your Flickr account to your Ravelry account.

context.p: To link your Flickr account to Ravelry:

step.cmd: From any of your saved projects or stash items, click Add Photos.
Click on Link to Your Flickr Account.
When the Flickr/Yahoo login page appears, login to your Flickr account.
When asked if you will allow Ravelry to link to your Flickr account, click OK.
